ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.coverUrl:
<js>
let replaceCover = (u) => {
    if (u.startsWith("https://")) u = u.substring(8)
    else u = u.substring(7)
    let uArr = u.split("/")
    uArr[0] = "https://p6-novel.byteimg.com/origin"
    let uArr2 = []
    uArr.forEach((x) => {
        if (!x.includes("?") && !x.includes("~")) uArr2.push(x)
        else uArr2.push(x.split("~")[0])
    })
    u = uArr2.join("/")
    return u
}
replaceCover(java.getString("thumb_url"))
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: book_name

bookSourceComment: 基于 PyFQWeb 项目开发的 Legado 兼容书源

ruleContent.content:
let res = JSON.parse(result).data.content function getComic(result) { let mat = result.match(/
([\s\S]*?)<\/article>/); try { let cnt = JSON.parse( mat ? mat[1].replace(/\&/g, '"').replace(/\;/g, "").replace(/\#34/g, "") : result ); return (mat ? cnt.skeleton.data : cnt.picInfos) .map((i) => { let path = mat ? cnt.materials[i.element_name].data.web_uri : "novel-pic/" + i.md5; return ``; }) .join("
"); } catch (e) { // not comic content mat = result.match(/([\s\S]*?)<\/body>/) // java.log(result) return (mat ? mat[1] : result).toString().replace(/\<\!DOCTYPE html.*/g, "").replace(/\/, "").replace(/\\<\/a\>/g, "") } } result = getComic(String(res)); result.replace(/\{\!\-\- PGC_VOICE\:.*\-\-\}/g, "")

ruleExplore.author: $.author
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
let replaceCover = (u) => {
// java.log(u)
if (u.startsWith("https://")) u = u.substring(8)
else u = u.substring(7)
let uArr = u.split("/")
uArr[0] = "https://p6-novel.byteimg.com/origin"
let uArr2 = []
uArr.forEach((x) => {
    if (!x.includes("?") && !x.includes("~")) uArr2.push(x)
    else uArr2.push(x.split("~")[0])
	})
u = uArr2.join("/")
return u
	}
  let list = [];
  let resultData = JSON.parse(result).data;
  // java.log(resultData)
  let data;
  if (resultData != null && resultData.book_shelf_info) {
    data = resultData.book_shelf_info;
    if (data != null) {
    let requestData = { books: [] };
    for (let i in data) {
      requestData["books"].push({
        book_id: data[i]["book_id"],
        item_id: "0",
      });
    }
    // java.log(JSON.stringify(resultData.book_shelf_info))
    let booksData = java.ajax(
      'https://fanqienovel.com/api/bookshelf/multidetail,{method: "post",body: ' +
        JSON.stringify(requestData) +
        "}"
    );
    // java.log(booksData)
    let books =  JSON.parse(booksData).data.detail_list;
    for (let i in books) {
      let d = books[i];
      list.push({
        src: d,
        book_name: d.book_name,
        thumb_url: replaceCover(d.thumb_url),
        abstract: d.abstract,
        book_id: d.book_id,
      });
    }
    }
  } else list = JSON.parse(result)[0].content
  JSON.stringify(list)
</js>$[*]
ruleExplore.name: $.book_name

ruleSearch.author: author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
let res = JSON.parse(result)
let books

res.search_tabs.forEach((i) => {
  if (i.tab_type == 3) books = i.data
})

let results = []

books.forEach(w => {
  results.push(w.book_data[0])
})

JSON.stringify(results)
</js>$[*]
ruleSearch.checkKeyWord: 转生三无猫娘，成神的我只想摸鱼
